data.title: The Geoff Love Singers – Your Hundred Favourite Love Songs Vol. 2
data.meta_description: The Geoff Love Singers, 'Your Hundred Favourite Love Songs Vol. 2' - vinyl record, 12", 33 1/3 RPM, LP - NEAR MINT record & sleeve condition! which includes:						A1			 			The First Time Ever I Saw Your Face							A2			 			My Cherie Amour							A3			 			I've Got You Under My Skin							A4			 			More							A5			 			Unchained Melody							A6			 			You Are The Sunshine Of My Life							A7			 			Love Story ("Where Do I Begin")							B1			 			What'll I Do							B2			 			All My Loving							B3			 			Something							B4			 			True Love							B5			 			There! I've Said It Again							B6			 			Falling In Love Again							B7			 			The Way We Were			 Label: Music For Pleasure - MFP 50519Series - Your Hundred Favourite Love Songs - Vol. 2Format: Vinyl, 12", LP, Album, CompilationCountry: UKReleased: 1980Genre: Jazz, PopStyle: Easy Listening CompaniesRecord Company - Supertunes Ltd.Printed & Made By - Garrod & Lofthouse Ltd.Recorded At - Abbey Road Studios CreditsRecording Engineer - John KurlanderProduced By - Norman Newell NotesA-1,℗ 1974 A-2,3,4,5,6,℗ 1980 A-7,℗ 1975B-1,7,℗ 1974 B-2.4.5.6,℗ 1980 B-3,℗ 1975℗ Original Sound Recording made by Supertunes Ltd.This Compilatiom ℗ 1980, Music For Pleasure Limited. Barcode & other identifiersMatrix / Runout (Side A Label): MFP 50502AMatrix / Runout (Side B Label): MFP 50502B Matrix / Runout (Side A Stamped): MFP 50502 A-1Matrix / Runout (Side B Stamped): MFP 50502 B-1Matrix / Runout (Side B Hand Etched): HTM This record is in NEAR MINT condition. The covers are in NEAR MINT condition, BUT HAVING SOME SIGNS OF TIME, WITH ADDITIONAL PROTECTIVE SLEEVE. THE VINYL IS BOTH CLEAN AND SHINY WITH NO DEEP SCRATCHES.
data.text: We are a British Company with a registered office in London, while the manufacturing unit is near Glasgow. We are exclusively b2c; this means that our products are available only from us, no mid men; we design, manufacture and sell directly to the end-user.
